title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Green Parks Plan
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Green Parks Plan              Green Parks Plan       The Green Parks Plan (GPP) articulates an overarching vision that will make everything we do more sustainable by establishing environmental performance targets, empowering staff to be agents of change, collaborating with stakeholders, and engaging millions of visitors to support this effort during visits and while at home. We can all make a difference! To read the full plan, "Green Parks Plan: Advancing Our Mission Through Sustainable Operations," open/download the pdf (7MB). For more information, visit the NPS.gov main page for the Green Parks Plan at http://www.nps.gov/greenparksplan/
